duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform routine teller transactions, new account transactions, and work directly with clients.
Maintain and balance a cash supply for transactions performed.
Provide comprehensive deposit services to individuals and small businesses.
Promote the full range of deposit products and services that best meet the client’s needs.
Receive consumer loan applications, review loan packages, and process simple consumer loan packages.
Assist customers with account maintenance, online banking, mobile banking, and other complex account issues.
Utilize sales techniques to uncover customer needs and match them to the bank’s products and services.
Review client transactions for red flags and fraudulent items. Prevent clients from becoming victims of fraud.
Gather data and process various reports and forms to ensure compliance with bank policies and regulatory compliance programs.
Keep a clean, organized work area and a professional appearance. Complete required compliance training in a timely manner.
Participate in branch, region, and bank campaigns.
